Instruction: Heat a large skillet on medium-high heat. Cook and stir the beef, onion, and garlic in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, about 5 to 7 minutes.
Add cheese to the skillet; stir until melted and evenly combined, about 1 to 2 minutes.

Bring the mixture to a boil, then lower the heat to medium-low and let it simmer, adding water as necessary to achieve your preferred consistency, until the macaroni is al dente, about 20 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning before serving.
